alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Walton, southwestern Holmes and southwestern Washington Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 303 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Vernon, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Ebro, Bruce, Red Head, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad and Knox Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
